official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend certain authorities thereunder, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend the National Flood Insurance Program through FY 1991. Permits monies from the National Flood Insurance Fund to be used for the coordination of flood insurance with land management programs in flood-prone areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend certain authorities thereunder, and for other purposes.
